# Troubleshooting

| Problem                              | Solution                                                                                                                                                      |
|--------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| The camera turns off suddenly.       | The battery is exhausted: Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 50).                                                                  |
| The camera does not turn off.        | The camera may be busy. Check the indicator lamp (ðŸ“– 10).                                                                                                      |
| Charging does not start.             | - Make sure that the AC power adapter is correctly plugged in (ðŸ“– 50).                                                                                         |
|                                      | - Ensure that the plug adapter is correctly connected to the AC power adapter (ðŸ“– 50).                                                                         |
|                                      | - **The battery has not been recharged for an extended period:** If the battery has not been charged for an extended period, charging will be disabled to ensure safety. Replace it with a new battery. |
| Charging does not start (USB).       | - Insert the camera battery (ðŸ“– 43).                                                                                                                           |
|                                      | - Reinsert the camera battery in the correct orientation (ðŸ“– 43).                                                                                              |
|                                      | - Confirm that the camera is connected to the computer (ðŸ“– 53).                                                                                                |
|                                      | - If the computer is off or in sleep mode, turn on or wake the computer and disconnect and reconnect the USB cable (ðŸ“– 53).                                    |
| Charging does not start (battery charger). | - Insert the battery.                                                                                                                                          |
|                                      | - Reinsert the battery in the correct orientation.                                                                                                             |
|                                      | - **The AC adapter is not correctly connected to the charger:** Check that adapter is correctly connected to the charger.                                      |
| Charging is slow.                    | Charge the battery at room temperature.                                                                                                                       |
